abstrac: Industrial Design, CAD & Engineering Design Services
bio:
Hi,
Thank you for visiting my profile.

Am an Industrial Designer and a Mechanical Engineer with a 2 decade experience in Styling and Designing consumer hardware products.

I offer following services:

--- Industrial-Design:
- Product-Design from Scratch
- Product Styling
- Rendering
- 3D Animation

--- CAD Services:
- 3D Modeling
- 2D Drafting
- Patent Illustration

--- Engineering-Design:
- Structural soundness
- Design Calculations
- Design-to-Manufacture

I churn out aesthetically appealing new product styles from scratch in the capacity of Industrial Designer. As an Engineering-Designer am equipped with exemplary CAD skills, thorough knowledge of designing Plastic and other parts along with their manufacturing processes like Injection mould design, to help you realize your products.

My long corporate experience, sharp acumen in packaging design, skills in manufacturing processes ensure you get the most awesome-looking product that performs great as well. My services are GST-registered in my country and I work full time on such projects leading to the fastest turnaround of your project. My impeccable spoken and written English and the highest level of ethics ensure you a highly satisfying business experience.

I look forward to working on your project.
We prefer receiving milestone payments for our projects, which are set and agreed upon at the start of the project.

abstrac: Graphic designer, illustrator for polygraphy, and web design
bio:
Hello, I'm Maryna, and I am a graphic designer and an illustrator.
I'm based in Germany now.
I have fourteen years of professional experience, and I have cooperated with more than 100 customers.
I have always been working on my style, looking for new decisions, ideas, and lines.
I am very careful with my client's ideas and wishes, so my priority is to focus on reaching your goals.

What I can do for you:

Digital drawing
Hand drawing
Fashion sketches
Fashion portrait
Beauty illustrations

Feel free to contact me, I am always open to interesting projects.

My work consists of 2 stages: first stage - preliminary sketch (on this step you can make a few changes that the drawing reflects your idea as much as possible), second - adding color to a drawing.
We discuss all steps with you. Also, you can make up to 2 free corrections to the 1st and 2nd stages.

commnet: Great experience working with Vladimir. I highly recommend him !!

bio:
For the last 10 years my primary field of work is Web and Mobile Development, and in general I have more than 10 years of experience in software development for different platforms. As a responsible person, skilled and ambitious professional I would like to use all my knowledge, experience and strong technical background to help you bring your ideas to Web and Mobile Platforms. I know how to work hard, learn quick, and be a part of a team. Also, in software development it is always important be open and honest and I am ready for that.

Main skills:
[Web]
* React.js/NextJS, Vue.js/Nuxt, Angular2+
* PHP/Laravel/CodeIgniter/CakePHP, Node.js/Express/Meteor, Python/Django, Ruby On Rails
* Apollo/GraphQL
* MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, FirebaseDB, DynamoDB
* Typescript, ES6/7/8, HTML/CSS, Less/Sass, jQuery
* Responsive Design, Bootstrap, Material-UI, Semantic UI
* Wordpress/Woocommerce, E-commerce

[Mobile]
* Native Android app development
* Native iOS app development
* Java, Kotlin, Android Studio
* Xcode, Swift, Cocoapods, Objective-c
* React Native and Flutter, Xamarin, Ionic
* UI and UX, Material Design, fast UI prototyping
* Custom UI of any complexity (custom views, animations, themes)
* Multiple devices (and screen sizes/resolutions) support

List of different third party technologies I am familiar with:
* Push Notification (Firebase Cloud Messaging)
* Social Network Integration (Facebook SDK, Twitter)
* Payments (Stripe SDK)
* Online Data Storage (Amazon AS3 SDK)
* Local Database Storage (SQLite,including SQLCipher, Realm)
* Mobile Analytic (Fabric: Crashlytics & Events)
* Network interaction (REST, Retrofit, Alamofire, Json, SOAP, GET/POST data,)
* Hardware (Camera, sensors)
* Google Tesseract OCR system Integration
* GPS, Maps
* Multi-threading
* Email and SMS sending
* Video and Audio streaming
* C/C++
* Git

If you can't see here something that you need, then it doesn't mean that I can't handle it, it means I had too much to fit in! Just ask me.

Work at your time zone.
Fast communication with your wanted messenger
40~50 hours available in a week.
